Reviews.Title: A bargain price for a great laptop.
Reviews.Author: bryan durfee
Reviews.Content: This laptop is amazingly fast and powerful. It boots in about five seconds, and the wait times are minimal for copying/transfering files and music. The vendor was very helpful when contacted with requests, and I plan to buy another one from them for a gift for a family member.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: barbara caputo
Reviews.Content: within weeks of buying this computer it died, didn't even have it ninety days, and am extremely disappointed, not happy

Reviews.Title: Terrific Laptop
Reviews.Author: Estcher
Reviews.Content: Pretty amazing laptop for the price.  This is PERFECT for young children approaching their teens or in their early teens.  Graphic card will allow the playing of simple games like Minecraft, Roblox, etc.  Software installation was pretty straight forward.  Had a scare with authorizing Windows but don't worry - it will sort itself out once you connect online.

Reviews.Title: ITEM RETURNED
Reviews.Author: GOGGLES "GOGGLES"
Reviews.Content: FOR MY PURPOSES, HAVING TO LOAD AND ACTIVATE SOFTWARE PROVED DIFFICULT.SELLER WAS QUITE HELPFUL IN MY RETURN REQUEST.HAD I BEEN MORE OF A COMPUTER GEEK, I PROBABLY COULD HAVE GOTTEN EVERYTHING UP AND RUNNING.
